description.en: Stellar (XLM) is a cryptocurrency launched in 2014. Stellar has a current supply of 50,001,786,883.65895 with 32,390,721,750.58802 in circulation. The last known price of Stellar is 0.24338103 USD and is up 5.56 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 792 active market(s) with $243,268,282.61 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.stellar.org.
